text: Yesu viyakalile muna dibululu dimwe, munhu imwe yeli yolumwa dikulu lukuli lwose keza. Viyamuwone Yesu, kaibwanha hasi chingubingubi na kumulamba, “Mndewa, wahalonda, kodaha kunihonyo!” 5:12 Dikulu ukala utamu wowomtenda munhu sekeyamtambikile Mulungu kwaviya kawoneka kambula mwiko haulongozi ha Mulungu.
